content.html: I almost want to never write TypeScript again because of how condescending people are. I know what I’m doing. I’ve been in this field for over 15 years. There are other approaches, ya know? Some of you need to try other types of languages.
content.value:
I almost want to never write TypeScript again because of how condescending people are.

I know what I’m doing. I’ve been in this field for over 15 years. There are other approaches, ya know? Some of you need to try other types of languages.
